body: This is just weird... and also lackluster + it looks like the childhood friend really has no interest in him so its kinda pointless
Well, I checked the tankoubon, and it doesn't look like it take the dark route, so y'all can rest easy.

idk im half hoping it winds up just a one on one consensual, with romantic tension with the other girl but no actual sex

im in a REALLY vanilla mood
Well this is Cuvie after all, every route can be happen

Ahh, your typical romance in hentai. The girl gonna get jealous, they will have sex, complain to each other about their feelings and stuff like that before, during or after sex and in the end they are gonna have a threesome later on. ORRR! We go to the "dark route" where the long haired girl will be taken by the other guy. I doubt that's gonna happen here though, but who knows
